title: Wrangell - St Elias National Park & Preserve: Park Newspaper
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     Park Newspaper               Park Newspaper           Download and read the current issue of our park visitor guide.   You can now download and enjoy the official newspaper and visitor's guide to Wrangell St. Elias National Park and Preserve, The K'elt'aeni. Named for the local Ahtna Athabaskan word for Mount Wrangell, this 12-page full-color newsletter will help you plan and enjoy your journey in this immense wilderness park. Produced by park staff!  Trip Planning Park Facilities Guide to Park Roads Maps Hiking Information Articles ...and lots more Download the Current Issue 12 pages, PDF format
